results.description: Uses news_pct_1min momentum and volume surprise. Applied SUGGESTION1 (combined pct move and vol_stddev), SUGGESTION2 not applicable, SUGGESTION3 not needed (both coverage >0.6), SUGGESTION4 used high userCount fields (news_pct_1min, news_vol_stddev). Confidence set to 0.85 (short-term momentum signal with good coverage).

Mean-reversion after initial move using news_pct_5_min and recent returns. S1: combined pct_5 and eod_close; S2 not used; S3 not needed (coverage>0.6); S4 picked common fields. Confidence 0.72 (typical short reversal).
Exploit open gap (news_open_gap) continuation vs pre_vwap. S1 combined open_gap and pre_vwap; S3: pre_vwap coverage 0.8289 (>0.6) so no backfill; S4 used widely used fields. Confidence 0.7.
Capture breakout using news_atr_ratio and news_atr14. S1 combined both volatility measures; S3 not needed (coverage>0.6); S4 used high alphaCount fields. Confidence 0.78.
Use news_pct_30min and post_vwap to capture sustained move. S1 applied; S3 not needed; S4 used popular pct_30min field. Confidence 0.8.
Compare news_eod_vwap and news_eod_close to detect buyer/seller pressure. S1 applied (2 fields), S3 not needed, S4 chosen high coverage fields. Confidence 0.77.
Exploit EPS actual (news_eps_actual) surprise vs price move (news_pct_10min). S1 applied; S3 not needed (coverage high); S4 used eps with many alphas. Confidence 0.74.
High short_interest signals squeeze potential using news_short_interest and recent pct_60min. S1 applied; S3 not needed (coverage>0.6); S4 used high userCount short_interest. Confidence 0.68.
Use immediate price at news (news_ton_last) returns over 1min. S1 used single field momentum; S3 not needed; S4 ton_last has high coverage. Confidence 0.73.
Relative move vs SPY (news_indx_perf). S1 used single derived field news_indx_perf; S3 not needed; S4 field has high coverage. Confidence 0.76.
Very short mean reversion using news_pct_30sec. S1 single field, S3 not needed (coverage>0.6), S4 moderate userCount. Confidence 0.6 (noisier).
Capture sustained moves using news_pct_120min and vol_ratio. S1 applied two fields; S3 not needed; S4 both have good coverage. Confidence 0.79.
Use news_tot_ticks and mov_vol to detect sudden activity. S1 used ticks and mov_vol; S3 not needed (coverage>0.6); S4 picks high alphaCount fields. Confidence 0.7.

Price range relative to recent using news_range_stddev and session_range_pct. S1 applied; S3: session_range_pct coverage 0.268 (<0.6) so applied ts_backfill in implementation? (but kept fields >0.6 here to respect KEEP_IN_MIND2). Chose range_stddev only to keep datafields ≤2. Confidence 0.65.
Fade moves between pre_vwap and post_vwap. S1 used both VWAPs; S3 not needed (coverage>0.6); S4 used widely available vwap fields. Confidence 0.71.
Use news_high_exc_stddev to detect outsized upside vs 30-day stddev. S1 single field; S3 not needed; S4 high coverage. Confidence 0.75.
Opposite of high-exc: use news_low_exc_stddev for downside mean reversion. S1 single field, S3 not needed. Confidence 0.74.
Scale short momentum by market cap (smaller caps move more). S1 combined news_pct_10min and news_cap; S3 news_cap coverage high; S4 news_cap high userCount. Confidence 0.69.
Use news_prev_day_ret and morning pct_10min to find continuation. S1 applied two fields; S3 prev_close coverage low (0.1728) so avoided using prev_close; S4 used prev_day_ret. Confidence 0.66.
High volume surprise (news_vol_stddev) combined with sudden move (news_pct_5_min) for reversion. S1 applied; S3 not needed; S4 both popular. Confidence 0.73.
Cross-sectional zscore of 30min returns to generate balanced exposures. S1 used single field and quantile normalization; S4 used high coverage. Confidence 0.8.
Normalize short price move by ATR (news_atr_ratio) for robust breakout signals. S1 single field, S3 not needed, S4 used atrRatio high alphaCount. Confidence 0.76.
Fade post-earnings 60min move when EPS small (news_eps_actual small) using pct_60min. S1 used two fields; S3 not needed; S4 used eps field. Confidence 0.63 (earnings moves noisy).
Filter momentum by short interest: long when pct_30min positive and short_interest high. S1 applied two fields; S3 not needed; S4 used high userCount short_interest. Confidence 0.7.
Fade pre-market gap between pre_vwap and ton_last. S1 used two fields; S3 not needed; S4 picked pre_vwap with decent coverage. Confidence 0.68.
Combine tot_ticks and pct_1min to identify micro breakouts. S1 applied; S3 not needed; S4 used high coverage tot_ticks. Confidence 0.72.
Favor momentum in lower PE names using news_pe_ratio and pct_30min. S1 applied; S3 not needed (pe coverage high); S4 used high userCount pe_ratio. Confidence 0.66.

Exploit after-hours minutes to first 10min using nws12_afterhsz_10_min where available. S1 used single after-hours field; S3 coverage ~0.3704 (<0.6) so ts_backfill recommended if used; here confidence 0.55 due to lower coverage.

results.idea: Fast micro momentum weighted by moving vol
results.description: Combine pct_1min momentum with mov_vol to weight signals. S1 used two fields; S3 not needed; S4 both fields have good counts. Confidence 0.78.
Use news_max_up_ret to find names with large immediate upside to ride momentum. S1 single field; S3 not needed; S4 field coverage good. Confidence 0.7.
Use news_max_dn_ret to detect oversold intraday names for mean-reversion. S1 single field; S3 not needed; Confidence 0.72.
Scale stock-level pct_10min by SPY move (news_spy_close/sp_y_last proxies). S1 used news_spy_close; S3 not needed; S4 used market field high coverage. Confidence 0.74.
Require both volstddev spike and curr_vol surge (news_vol_stddev and news_curr_vol). S1 applied; S3 curr_vol coverage 0.7769 OK; S4 used common fields. Confidence 0.75.
Compute ts_zscore of (ton_last - dayopen) over short window. S1 single derived metric using news_ton_last and news_open; S3 news_open coverage >0.6; S4 used high coverage. Confidence 0.7.
Scale EPS actual by atr14 to focus on big fundamental-news in volatile names. S1 applied two fields; S3 not needed; S4 used high alphaCount fields. Confidence 0.68.

Use news_open and news_prev_close to capture continuation of overnight gaps. S1 applied; S3 prev_close coverage low (0.1728) so avoided using prev_close directly—used prev_day_ret instead. Confidence 0.62.
Favor momentum in higher liquidity names to reduce impact. S1 used news_pct_30min and news_mov_vol; S3 not needed; S4 used high userCount mov_vol. Confidence 0.74.
Detect heavy tails via ts_kurtosis on pct_1min series. S1 single operator to detect tail events; S3 not needed; Confidence 0.58 (experimental).
Use information ratio of 30-day returns to pick persistent movers (ts_ir(news_pct_30min,30)). S1 used single field with ts_ir; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.76.
If high excursion (news_high_exc_stddev) large, fade short-term using pct_5_min. S1 applied two fields; S3 not needed; Confidence 0.7.

Require high session_range and high tot_ticks to confirm breakout. S1 applied two fields; session_range coverage low in some variants—here use news_session_range where available (coverage 0.4236) so if NaN apply backfill per S3. Confidence 0.6.
Apply linear decay to recent pct_1min to smooth signals. S1 used ts_decay_linear; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Pre/post session imbalance (open vs close vwap)
results.description: Compare main_vwap and post_vwap to capture late flow. S1 used two VWAPs; S3 not needed; S4 chosen common vwap fields. Confidence 0.69.
Rank short_interest cross-sectionally to identify squeeze candidates. S1 used group-style quantile via quantile(); S4 used high userCount short_interest. Confidence 0.7.
Combine short momentum and PE momentum (names with falling PE and rising price). S1 used pct_30min and pe_ratio; S3 not needed; Confidence 0.64.
Require both ATR14 and vol_stddev spikes to enter breakout. S1 applied two fields; S3 not needed; Confidence 0.75.

results.idea: Earnings surprise momentum scaled by cap
results.description: Scale earnings momentum by small cap bias (news_eps_actual × 1/news_cap). S1 applied two fields; S3 not needed; Confidence 0.66.
Require open_gap and curr_vol spike to act on the gap. S1 applied; S3 curr_vol coverage OK; Confidence 0.71.
Use news_pct_90min to pick durable moves. S1 single field high coverage; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.77.
If pct_1min extremely high (winsorize), fade with reverse zscore. S1 applied; used winsorize to limit outliers per KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Momentum combined with ticks per volume
results.description: Use tot_ticks normalized by mov_vol times pct_10min to detect active momentum. S1 two fields; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.72.
Prioritize names with high news_max_up_amt and positive pct_5_min. S1 two fields; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.7.
Use quantile on 60min returns to create balanced cross-sectional exposure. S1 single field normalization; S4 field high coverage. Confidence 0.79.
High ATR but large rapid upside suggests reversion; combine atr_ratio and pct_1min reversed. S1 applied; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.67.
Use ts_arg_max on pct_30min to detect if current is max in window — continuation signal. S1 single operator; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.7.
Use news_ratio_vol (curr_vol / mov_vol) as pure volume breakout signal. S1 single field, coverage ~0.5122 but acceptable; S3 not required here but available. Confidence 0.6.
Use result_vs_index to capture idiosyncratic moves vs index after news. S1 single field (news_result_vs_index variants), high coverage in many variants. Confidence 0.75.

results.idea: Micro momentum scaled by PE (value tilt)
results.description: Short-term pct_1min scaled by inverse PE to favor value names. S1 applied; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.65.
Measure drift of eod_vwap relative to ton_last to pick direction. S1 two fields; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.72.
Use tot_ticks / mov_vol as activity per volume and multiply by pct_30min. S1 applied two fields; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Short-term continuation if ton_last new record
results.description: Use newrecord flag (nws12_mainz_newrecord) combined with pct_5_min to favor continuation after fresh news. S1 used newrecord and pct_5_min; newrecord coverage high; Confidence 0.67.
Use rangestddev to identify extreme intraday ranges and fade. S1 single field; S3 rangestddev coverage ~0.6172 (>0.6) so no backfill. Confidence 0.7.
Use news_prev_day_ret and pct_60min to trade continuation across the day. S1 applied two fields; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.66.
Scale pct_10min by tot_ticks to prioritize liquid movers. S1 used two fields; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.71.
Require vol_stddev spike to confirm 5min continuation. S1 applied two fields; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.73.
Quantile normalize news_result1 across universe to get cross-sectional exposure after earnings. S1 single field quantile; S4 used high userCount result1. Confidence 0.78.
If max_up much larger than max_down, fade immediate reaction. S1 applied two fields (maxup, maxdown); S3 not needed. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Pre-market momentum scaled by provider reliability
results.description: Weight pre-market pct by newssess/provider index (nws12_prez_provider) to prefer reliable sources. S1 used provider index (coverage high) and pct; S2 not used. Confidence 0.6 (provider mapping noisy).
Scale pct_30sec into [0,1] using ts_scale to reduce outliers. S1 used ts_scale; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.64.
Divide short momentum by ts_std_dev to prefer stable signals (ts_std_dev on pct_10min). S1 applied two operators; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.7.
If move occurs on low ticks (illiquid), require stronger signal; combine pct_1min and tot_ticks inversely. S1 applied; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.62.
If eod_vwap deviates strongly from ton_last, expect reversion. S1 used two vwap fields; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.68.
Detect rising short interest (ts_delta) and prefer momentum where shorts accumulate. S1 applied short_interest and pct_30min; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.65.
Fade extreme 120min moves via reverse zscore. S1 single field; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.7.
Scale pct_10min by session range to avoid signals during wide sessions. S1 used two fields; session_range low coverage—so rely on news_range_stddev instead. Confidence 0.66.
Use high-exc stddev measures (highexcstddev) to find outsized single-day moves. S1 single field; S3 not needed; Confidence 0.73.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted for market session index
results.description: Use reportsess or newssess index to condition signals (nws12_mainz_newssess × pct_5_min). S1 used session index and pct; S3 not needed (coverage high). Confidence 0.6.
Use result_vs_index to isolate firm-specific moves then take momentum. S1 single derived field; S3 not needed; Confidence 0.75.
Use pre_vwap deviations and atrratio to detect pre-open breakouts. S1 used two fields; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.68.
Winsorize curr_vol then multiply with pct_1min to reduce outlier volume effects. S1 applied winsorize per operator availability. Confidence 0.72.
Favor earnings momentum in small caps using news_eps_actual and news_mktcap inverse. S1 used two fields; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Short-term directional signal using ton_high/ton_low gap
results.description: Use difference between ton_high and ton_low to estimate intraday skew and trade accordingly. S1 used two fields; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.6.
Rank recent pct_30min over time (ts_rank) and use high ranks. S1 single operator; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.72.
Divide earnings move by volstddev to prioritize strong fundamental moves in quiet stocks. S1 used epsactual and volstddev; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.69.
Quantile normalize opengap and fade extreme quantiles. S1 single opengap field quantile; S3 not needed (coverage ~0.6247). Confidence 0.63.
Cross-sectional quantile of main_vwap returns over 30min. S1 used single vwap field with quantile; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.76.
Reverse moves that occur on extreme tick counts by combining tot_ticks and pct_5_min reversed. S1 applied; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.65.

Bucket mov_vol into liquidity groups and scale pct_10min accordingly (bucket + multiply). S1 used bucket to create group but KEEP_IN_MIND4 prohibits group by itself; we use bucket only as grouping param if group operators used — to keep short, just multiply by mov_vol. Confidence 0.62.
Fade names with large maxupamt using reverse zscore. S1 single field; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.68.
Scale pct_1min by provider reliability index (nws12_mainz_provider). S1 used provider field (coverage high) and pct; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.58.
Use ts_quantile on pct_5_min to detect extreme recent ranks. S1 single operator; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.7.
Require ATR spike to confirm 60min continuation (news_pct_60min × atr_ratio). S1 applied two fields; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.74.
Prefer momentum in small-range sessions by dividing by session_range_pct (low coverage) — use backfill if missing per S3. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Earnings post-30min continuation if high ticks
results.description: Combine result1 and tot_ticks to trade earnings continuation on high-activity names. S1 applied two fields; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.69.
Reverse ts_zscore of news_mins_3_chg to capture short mean reversion. S1 single field coverage high. Confidence 0.63.
Divide pct_10min by market move (news_spy_close) to isolate idiosyncratic moves. S1 applied two fields; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.72.
Use sign of eps_actual times pct_5_min to prefer continuation when EPS positive. S1 applied two fields; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.66.
Winsorize atr14 then use as filter for trend (winsorize + multiply). S1 used winsorize to limit outliers. Confidence 0.61.
Use ts_av_diff on pct_30min to remove seasonal intraday bias and then zscore. S1 applied ts_av_diff; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.68.
Favor 30min momentum in low PE names (divide by pe_ratio). S1 applied two fields; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.63.
Use ts_ir of pct_30min to favor stable momentum names. S1 used ts_ir; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.74.
Use ts_arg_min/arg_max to detect if current minute is local extremum and trade continuation accordingly. S1 used ts_arg_max on pct_1min. Confidence 0.6.
Winsorize pct_5_min then normalize cross-sectionally to reduce outlier influence. S1 applied winsorize + quantile. Confidence 0.7.
Prefer momentum entries when prior 30-day vol low: divide pct_10min by ts_std_dev(pct_10min,30). S1 applied two operators; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.68.
If news_max_up_ret exceeds threshold (bucket), go long. S1 used bucket operator to discretize. KEEP_IN_MIND2: bucket is single operator. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by total daily ticks
results.description: Favor momentum in names with high tot_ticks to ensure tradability. S1 applied tot_ticks and pct_10min. Confidence 0.7.
Fade extreme result2 moves (nws12_mainz_result2) with reverse zscore. S1 single field; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.67.
Note: GROUP operators must receive a group field; we avoid group usage per KEEP_IN_MIND4 and instead normalize cross-sectionally. Used quantile on pct_30min. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Immediate reaction scaled by post_vwap gap
results.description: Use (post_vwap - ton_last) to weight pct_1min. S1 applied two fields; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.68.
Use tot_ticks aggregated and pct_30min to confirm moves. S1 applied two fields; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after big open gap
results.description: Fade when open gap extreme: reverse zscore(open_gap). S1 single field; coverage >0.6. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by daily volatility rank
results.description: Use ts_rank of atr14 to downweight very volatile names and favor persistent movers. S1 two-step ranking and multiply. Confidence 0.66.
Favor 30min momentum in small caps by multiplying pct_30min with inverse mktcap. S1 applied two fields. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Micro reversal conditioned on high volstddev
results.description: If vol_stddev high, reverse short micro moves; combine vol_stddev and pct_1min reversed. S1 applied two fields. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Momentum persistence requiring top quantile ticks
results.description: Only take momentum if tot_ticks in top quantile—use quantile on tot_ticks multiplied by pct_10min. S1 applied two fields and quantile. Confidence 0.7.
Use provider index to tilt earnings momentum; S1 used provider and result1. Coverage high for provider fields in main variants. Confidence 0.6.
